issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly conda Windows builds fail (time out)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6444](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6444). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Ursa-Labs/crossbow/builds/27144537 and https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Ursa-Labs/crossbow/builds/27144534. Both run for 60 minutes and get killed: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Ursa-Labs/crossbow/builds/27144534/messages

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6444?focusedCommentId=16923542) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Seems like they have passed now: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5278#issuecomment-528322202

I'm closing it, because we don't really have any other options left then AppVeyor, until CF can use pipelines for the windows builds as well.
